definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: So, the third guy is when we come back to the origin along the diagonal.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分沿對角線回到原點。

sentences.english: A diagonal interleave method is proposed based on the distance properties of Turbo codes.
sentences.chinese: 根據碼距特性提出了對角交織的優化交織法。

sentences.english: Draw a square, and then cross the two diagonals.
sentences.chinese: 畫一個正方形，然後畫兩條對角線。

sentences.english: For everyone who has dreamt of walking the streets of Diagon Alley, they soon will have the chance.
sentences.chinese: 對於夢想在對角巷閒逛的人來說，機會就要來了。

sentences.english: The tridiagonal matrix method is introduced for the analogue computation in the rectification process of associated system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹締合物系精餾過程模擬計算的三對角矩陣法。

sentences.english: This is prefaced by the words “Let me explain, ” which is a key transitional phrase that catches the attention of a diagonal reader.
sentences.chinese: 以“讓我解釋一下”這句話抓住對角線讀者注意力。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new derivative free optimization (DFO) method which is based on a quadratic tridiagonal interpolation model.
sentences.chinese: 該文提出了一個基於二次三對角模型的直接搜索法。

sentences.english: Bring them in line with the first CD into oblique flower vine on the angle .
sentences.chinese: 使其與第一張CD的花卉藤蔓成爲斜對角。

sentences.english: Make up and tighten the bolts diagonally when the X-tree is installed.
sentences.chinese: 安裝採油樹是要對角上緊螺栓。

sentences.english: A pattern of crisscross diagonal lines.
First, the condition of realization of robust diagonal dominance at a certain point is given.
sentences.chinese: 首先給出了系統在某一點處實現魯棒對角優勢的條件。

sentences.english: Christmas lights illuminate the Diagonal Avenue in Barcelona, Spain.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕裝飾燈照亮西班牙巴塞羅那的對角大街。

sentences.english: Change to spare tire diagonally form twist screw.
sentences.chinese: 換上備用輪胎，以對角形式扭緊螺絲。

sentences.english: The diagonal inertia tensor of mass relative to the center of mass.
sentences.chinese: 相對於重心的質量的慣性張量對角線。

sentences.english: The four screw bolts should be tightened up in turn in asymmetrically diagonal position.
sentences.chinese: 四隻螺栓要對稱地成斜對角情勢依次收緊。

sentences.english: In the end , the diagonal loading in high rank signal environment is briefly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 最後，簡單介紹了高秩信號環境中的對角加載。

definition: floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
Makung city in Penghu county 澎湖縣|澎湖县[Peng2 hu2 xian4] (Pescadores Islands), Taiwan
